name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, a lawyer posted a video saying that she plans to move to Hong Kong because she does not feel the society respects life here. Including food safety issues, vicious dogs injuring people, and forcibly sending people to mental hospitals, all make people feel very scary. "Although I am a lawyer, I can't even speak freely, how can I protect myself?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China Securities Association: A company may dismiss a chief economist if he or she causes reputational risks due to inappropriate personal words and deeds on multiple occasions within a certain period of time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A medical staff member from Zhejiang Province posted that 15.36% of the national COVID-19 anti-epidemic subsidy for 2023 that has been issued to individuals will be directly deducted from their personal bonuses this month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some riders in Shenyang reported that Ele.me forced riders to order more expensive rider meals, and they were fined for not ordering.
The rider said: The rider meals launched in the Ele.me rider app are more expensive than ordering takeout directly, and you have to ride your bike to the store to eat, and the categories are still single. Special delivery riders are required to order at least one meal a day, and will be fined RMB 20 if they do not order.
The rider cursed quite harshly at the end of the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 19, a blogger posted a video accusing a jeans production live broadcast room of ignoring the safety of workers. The live broadcast room was broadcasting the potassium permanganate spraying operation to sell jeans. The boss of the live broadcast room wore a four-layer mask, while the employees at work had no protective equipment. Potassium permanganate can corrode the eyes, skin, and respiratory tract. Inhalation can cause pulmonary edema and even respiratory failure, and it is also reproductive toxic. The factory also carried out sand washing operations, which can cause pneumoconiosis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking: A BMW car crashed into a crowd in Magdeburg, Germany
The Daily Telegraph reported that at 7:40 p.m. Friday, German time, a car crashed into a crowd at a Christmas market in Magdeburg, killing at least two people and injuring dozens of people, including a child. Local officials described it as a terrorist attack.
According to the city government, at least 68 people were injured, 15 of whom were in critical condition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Daily Telegraph reported: The suspect, believed to be a Saudi doctor, drove his car straight into people shopping at a Christmas market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19th, Ningjin, Dezhou: Due to the arrears of wages for migrant workers in the Danguiyuan A District high-rise project and the Tsinghua Garden project, workers gathered and held banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A surveillance video of the suspected scene of the incident was leaked. The car ran through a dense crowd at high speed, and no one had time to react.
Bloody video warning⚠️

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some medical staff posted a video to complain that since the reform of the medical insurance DRG, hospitals are now facing bankruptcy, and patients have to pay for the centralized procurement of drugs and medical materials at their own expense. Even some centralized procurement consumables are of poor quality, and the urinary catheter can be easily torn off, leaving half of it in the bladder. Many medical staff echoed the problem of centralized procurement consumables in the comment area: Peritoneal catheter leakage caused bacterial infection peritonitis, and the patient died. The deep vein guide wire was stuck in the blood vessel and could not move forward or backward. The infusion set broke in front of the patient. The injection needle was bent

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: President Xi has pointed out the direction for the study of Chinese character culture, thought and pronunciation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, the traffic law enforcement officers of Yucheng County, Henan Province, issued a ticket to a car repair shop because the repair shop did not register, and used a personal payment code to collect a fine of 1,000 yuan, which aroused doubts. The traffic bureau responded: As long as the invoice is real, there is a 99% chance that the money has been handed over. When asked whether the fine was handed over to the finance department, the staff did not directly answer. Netizens in the comment area asked: 99%, what about the 1%? It should be that the government has no money, and the fines replace wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contribution by a netizen: This netizen discovered that the Telegram Chinese resource search robot "Jisou" cannot search for "Xi Jinping". If you search for "Xi Jinping", it will be displayed as a banned word, but searches for Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin, Hu Jintao, and even June 4th will yield results.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Someone jumped off a building in Shenzhen Excellence Qianhai Future City to demand a debt
On-site management personnel threatened passers-by not to stop and watch

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 20 Shanghai A DJI drone purchased by a netizen caught fire at home. Fortunately, the owner returned home in time and no greater damage was caused.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution December 19th Harbin middle schools issued a letter of commitment to students, requiring them to promise not to set off fireworks within the Fourth Ring Road and to fill in their detailed home addresses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a college student who returned to his hometown to start a business in Xinxiang, Henan, reported in his real name that the local Land Bureau and the Agricultural Bureau, without any procedures and only with verbal notification, brought people to forcibly demolish the walls and ground of the yard he legally rented, and sent people to take compulsory measures against the college student and his family to force the demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, a netizen called the Nanchang police to ask why Li Yixue was not at home and recorded it. The video shows that the local government hotline operator only read the unified notice and did not give a direct answer to Li Yixue's whereabouts after repeated inquiries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, the developer of Shengtaowan Beautiful Courtyard in Longjiang Town, Shunde District, Foshan City, Banghua Group, the general contractor Jiuzhou Construction, maliciously withheld wages for migrant workers. Migrant workers gathered at the scene to demand wages for several days but to no avail.
Some migrant workers even went to the edge of the rooftop, pulled banners and jumped off the building to demand wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 19th After five years of living in a residential complex in Mentougou, Beijing, the owner found that the doors and windows could not be opened and there were cracks in the room. He suspected that the foundation had settled unevenly. The owner hoped to protect his rights through litigation and judicial appraisal. As soon as the lawsuit was filed, the property management closed the basement and sent more than 30 security guards to force repairs and destroy evidence. The police also sided with the developer, saying that the developer had a red-headed document and that if the owner obstructed the developer's construction, the police would take compulsory measures.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Juancheng Internet Police "explained the law with a case", saying that netizens who put up banners in front of the Party Committee Office Building to defend their rights and live broadcast were "vulgar live broadcasts" and disturbed public order.
What is elegance?
The Juancheng Internet Police said: "Netizen Dou Moumou was dissatisfied with the treatment of villagers in the village, so he went to a town party committee office building to put up a banner and started a live broadcast on a video platform, disturbing social public order, and was later persuaded to leave by the public security police. The public security organ issued an administrative warning and punishment to Dou Moumou in accordance with the law."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the principal of Yuren Primary School in Zhengzhou Economic Development Zone, Henan Province, ran away, and students were left without a school. 3,000 parents blocked the intersection to defend their rights. The Education Bureau said: The school has been deregistered for many years. It is reported that the school's tuition is as high as 30,000 yuan per year. Netizens: This school has been deregistered, but it can still recruit students and charge expensive tuition.
